abstract.p: Ciba Specialty Chemicals says earnings rose 114 million Swiss francs ($64 million) in third quarter on 9 percent increase in sales to 1.98 billion francs ($1.12 billion); graph (S)

block.p: Greater demand in Asia and increased sales of detergent ingredients contributed to a 46 percent surge in the third-quarter earnings at Ciba Specialty Chemicals, a leading chemical maker based in Basel, Switzerland. Ciba, a dominant manufacturer of detergent whiteners, said earnings rose to 114 million Swiss francs ($64 million) in the quarter on a 9 percent increase in sales to 1.98 billion francs ($1.12 billion). The results were stronger than expected and pushed up Ciba's share price 1.2 percent, to 95.5 francs ($53.85).
